errors.commentLength: Comment must be less than 1000 characters
errors.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close?

tooltips.requiredComment: A comment is required when rating -2

placeholders.requiredComment: Please explain why you're rating this -2...

confirmations.deleteRating: Are you sure you want to delete this rating from {{username}}?

tooltips.lastUpdated: Last time this rating was modified

rating.title: Rating Format
rating.description: Ratings can be entered in various formats, including single ratings, ranges, and special cases.

examples.title: Examples
examples.shortRange: The same (P prefix is implied for both)

averaging.title: Rating Averaging
averaging.description: The system uses a weighted average calculation that takes into account several factors:

points.special: Special ratings (-2, -21, etc.) override the average if they receive 4 or more votes
points.ranges: Ranges (like U12~U14) are averaged before contributing to the final rating
points.order: PGU ratings are averaged based on their difficulty order, not their numerical values

filters.title: Available Filters
filters.hideRatedDesc: Hides levels you have already rated
filters.lowDiffDesc: Filter levels marked as low difficulty
filters.fourVoteDesc: Filter levels that have 4 or more ratings

points.comment: A comment is required when rating a level as -2
points.format: Ratings must follow the PGU format (P1-P20, G1-G20, U1-U20) or be a valid special rating
points.special: Special ratings are predefined and cannot be customized
